      • connectDevice

        public void connectDevice(java.lang.String deviceAddress,
                 long timeoutMsec)
                   throws RemoteException
        connect to a device with the specified deviceAddress (MAC address string: XX:XX:XX..)
        Parameters:
        deviceAddress - MAC address of the device
        timeoutMsec - connection timeout in milliseconds
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • disconnectDevice

        public void disconnectDevice(java.lang.String deviceAddress)
                      throws RemoteException
        disconnect from a device with the specified deviceAddress (MAC address string: XX:XX:XX..)
        Parameters:
        deviceAddress - MAC address of the device NOTE: this will cause a broadcast receiver message with ACTION_CONNECTION_STATE
        Throws:
        RemoteException
